Description: Fragment of lower wall and ring foot of an East Greek pottery bowl; cream slip; on the interior succession of red and black rings; lower wall reserved save for single line; outside of foot glazed; inside of foot and underside reserved.
Curator's comments: Modern graffiti on broken edges 'HERA' and '.ERA', where the first letter resembles a phi.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.616)
